features.label: Lucky
features.description: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack, ability check or saving throw you can reroll but must use this new value.

features.label: Brave
features.description: Advantage on saving throw vs fear.

features.label: Nimbleness
features.description: Can move through the space of any creature that is larger size than you.

features.label: Naturally Stealthy
features.description: Can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only a creature that is at least on size larger than you.

features.label: Stout Resilience
features.description: Advantage on saving throws vs poison and resistant to poison damage.
